structure.unit: Chapter 26 PARK AND RECREATION DEPARTMENT RULES AND REGULATIONS

text.section:
Sec. 26-28. Partnership Agreements.
The type of Partnership Agreement and the required delegated authority, (Department Director, County Mayor or County Mayor's designee, or Board of County Commissioners) to enter into such agreements shall be determined by the purpose, use, duration and level of capital investment incurred by the Programming Partner, and shall be detailed in the Implementing Order.
